r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: Bug fix release for CGI mode + Added test on script 'php_beautifier', to verify that the php interpreter is the 'cli' one. * Bug fix: References of STDIN and STDOUT generates Notices on cgi mode. Reported by Tobias Bielohlawek (ted42 at web.de).
